title: Increase navbar logo size and alignment in header

requirements.text: Update the navbar logo rendering in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` so the logo appears larger in the header: set the logo image height to be within 36–40px on mobile and 48–56px on desktop, while preserving aspect ratio (no stretching).

quotes:
Increase the logo height in the navbar.
Desktop: 48–56px height
Mobile: 36–40px height
Ensure aspect ratio is preserved (no stretching).

acceptanceCriteria: On viewport widths below the `sm` breakpoint, the rendered logo height is between 36px and 40px.
On desktop viewports, the rendered logo height is between 48px and 56px.
The logo uses `width: auto` (or equivalent) so the SVG is not stretched/squashed.

requirements.text: Ensure the navbar logo is not visually reduced by extra padding or a constrained parent container: the logo’s displayed height must match the intended CSS height (not shrunk due to padding, line-height, or container constraints), and the logo remains vertically aligned with the Login/Logout button in the header.

quotes:
Do not shrink it inside extra padding.
Maintain proper vertical alignment with the Login button.

acceptanceCriteria: The logo and the Login/Logout button are vertically centered relative to each other in the header (no noticeable baseline mismatch).
There is no additional padding/margin applied to the logo element that reduces its visible size relative to the specified height.

requirements.text: Use only the clean SVG logo asset for the header logo (no raster/PNG logo usage in the navbar), keeping the existing SVG path as the source of truth.

quotes: Use the clean SVG version only

acceptanceCriteria: The header logo `` source points to an SVG asset (not PNG/JPG).
No alternative raster logo source is used for the navbar logo across breakpoints.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/hooks/` listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all changes within the existing React + Tailwind setup; do not introduce new frontend frameworks or backend services.
nonGoals: Generating or redesigning the logo artwork.
Changing favicon, footer logo, or other branding placements not directly related to the header logo size/alignment.
